Uses of Class
egl.DepthState

  • Packages that use DepthState 
    Package Description
    egl  

    • Uses of DepthState in egl

      Fields in egl declared as DepthState 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static DepthState DepthState.DEFAULT
      Draw Only When Depth Is Less Than Or Equal To Depth Buffer, Overwriting Depth
      static DepthState DepthState.DEPTH_READ
      Draw Only When Depth Is Less Than Or Equal To Depth Buffer, Without Overwriting Depth
      static DepthState DepthState.DEPTH_WRITE
      Overwrite The Depth Buffer With Current Depth
      static DepthState DepthState.NONE
      Do Not Write Depth Or Read Depth To Draw
      Methods in egl with parameters of type DepthState 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void SpriteBatch.renderBatch(Matrix4 mWorld, Matrix4 mCamera, BlendState bs, SamplerState ss, DepthState ds, RasterizerState rs) 
      void SpriteBatch.renderBatch(Matrix4 mWorld, Matrix4 mCamera, BlendState bs, SamplerState ss, DepthState ds, RasterizerState rs, Vector4 cMul, Vector4 cAdd)
